item.title: What is a name? LSTMs
item.description: TODO: include link to notebooks (put on github) make your own sigmoid graph (optional) improve code highlighting improve code font size make graph where x axis is length y is ratio Today I want to talk about names. Mine has been around since the Old Testament, but recently celebrities have been getting pretty creative with what they call their kids. A few weeks ago, my team was assigned a project parsing resumes for new hires, and when I realized that some students were born on Mars and never learned to put their name at the top of the page, I thought this would be an interesting problem to solve with a neural net.
